title: [Reticent Repose, Bedchamber]
description: Scarlet and ebon ombre byssus curtains frame a broad bay window above a cushioned alabaster bench.  Moonlight reflects off parquet-patterned mistwood floors, simultaneously causing shimmered shadows along the artisanal pearlescent finish on the rose-hued walls.  Ceiling-draped swathes of soft black gossamer create a dark halo around a four poster bed facing a whitewashed stone fireplace nestled between a mahogany vanity and a large armoire.
